description:
You are the last human alive on an abandoned space station named Aphelion with only an AI companion to guide you. Armed with a pair of manipulation gloves, you will have to manipulate the scale and energy of objects to solve puzzles and make your way around Aphelion to escape its certain destruction.

Gameplay
  • Explore an environment that combines retro sci-fi with modern sensibilities.
  • Use your abilities to scale objects up and down and revert energy from one power source to another.
  • Along your journey, the fully-voiced AI will accompany you and provide useful tips and insights into the station's history.

Aphelion is a 3D VR exploration game made using Unreal Engine 4. It is being developed by a group of second-year students as their vertical slice project.

Screenshots

Controls

  • Left Analog-stick: Motion/Snap Rotation function
  • Right Analog-stick: Motion/Teleportation Movement function
  • Y/B: Pull a Long Grabbed object towards you
  • X/A: Toggles the Edit mode
  • Left/Right Trigger button hold: Initiate Short Grab mode
  • Left/Right Grip button hold: Initiate Long Grab mode
  • Left/Right Grip and Trigger button hold: Grab small objects
  • Rotating the left controller counterclockwise while Editing: Absorb Energy
  • Rotating the left controller clockwise while Editing: Distribute Energy
  • Rotating the right controller counterclockwise while Editing: Scales Object Down
  • Rotating the right controller clockwise while Editing: Scales Object Up
                      Short Grab                     Long Grab                        Pull Object Specifications 

Disclaimer: this game is made solely for Oculus Quest 2.

The game runs on PC while it utilizes the Oculus Quest 2 headset and controllers. It's important to note that you cannot play this game directly from your headset. You'll need to link your headset with a compatible PC through a supported USB-C cable or a wireless connection via Wi-Fi.
